original_text: Saying, What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee? And he said, Lord, that I may receive my sight.
korean_text: 네게 무엇을 하여 주기를 원하느냐 이르되 주여 보기를 원하나이다

sentences.original_text: Saying, What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee?
sentences.korean_translation: 이르시되 내가 네게 무엇을 하기를 원하느냐 하시고

sentences.original_text: that I may receive my sight.
